text: <@U0289USNA> <@U026PHQ3J> just fyi I changed the user id data type. Now itâ€™s a string and from now on when you create a user it will be a uuid

<!channel>: talked with ewald today about place, page transitions, etc. and want to refresh / align what may be faint memories. i know Scott may be working toward some of this, but wanted to get out how I'm thinking about it.
this isn't gospel, but I think there is something nice about always sending the user through the feed, even for a split second, to make sure you understand sense of place.

Also, i think there may be a benefit to styling all profiles in the same way as we do detail view and the feed (light background, dark UI). That way we know everything in the "middle section" is light, and messages / menu are dark.
